reviews.review_text: Travelling solo and they happily accommodated me in the pub area. I could have chosen the restaurant area as well if I wanted. They have an extensive beer menu (as you would expect). The food menu is also extensive with fairly typical food options for this type of establishment (burgers, wings, pizza, etc.). I had the 1/2 ribs and they were phenomenonal. The meat was super tender and just fell off the bone. What made the accompanying fries so good was a tomato/garlic dipping sauce, which was sublime. They should bottle and sell that stuff! Im not sure what the rest of the menu was like, but for the ribs alone its worth trying! The service as slick and professional. I could easily have stayed for a couple more beers if I wasnt fighting jetlag.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks Adrian! Were very glad to see you enjoyed your stay with us, we agree the ribs are definitely worth stopping in for. We hope to see you next time youre in town!

reviews.review_text: Went there for the happy hour. Decent quality and our waiter was very friendly also beef brisket sandwiches was juicy and delicious.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Were glad to see you enjoyed your time, we cant we to see you again!

reviews.review_text: Best Eggs Benne ever! With the mouthwatering and melt on your mouth Brisket, ever.  Great service. The house beers are fantastic for someone looking for a light and refreshing thirst quencher. Try the Roundhouse wheat and the 604 Lager.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Great Photos! Glad to hear you enjoyed your morning with us, we hope to see you again soon!

reviews.review_text: Enjoyed a leisurely lunch with an amazing server who made the experience over the top. The server s name is Paul and what an outstanding individual! I have dietary concerns and Paul was able to answer my questions to ensure an enjoyable meal. I had the nachos and fried cauliflower with the YBC Sangria (read I had 3!). The food was delicious with generous portions. Thank you Paul for your hospitality, anyone in the area make sure to stop by and if you re lucky you will meet Paul!!!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: We are so happy you had a great experience.  Paul is truly a gem!  Hope to see you again soon.

reviews.review_text: If you go, I dont know if youre going to love it. What I can tell you is that when I went it was perfection. Yes, perfection. Ill tell you why. It was a chill weekend lunch and we stopped by for just a burger, lager and a small appetizer. Our server (Sally) was absolutely lovely. She waited on us hand and foot and did it with a smile the entire time, and she had other tables and watching her conduct herself with such quality consistency was refreshing. So, thats for the service. Now the food. The YBC Cheeseburger was everything I look for in a cheeseburger. Juicy, well-seasoned, smart ingredient proportionality and it was actually hot when it arrived, which very rarely happens with burger dishes. Burgers arriving at the table hot is like a Unicorn....no, Ive never seen a Unicorn, but you know what I mean.... The fries...well..the fries were everything a fry should be. It was crispy on the outside, cooked with quality oil and steaming hot and flakey on the inside while you bit in and seasoned just right. Technically it was a perfect serving of fries and it tasted absolutely amazing. Honestly, I was almost going to order a second serving of just fries, but you know.....calories and all that... The Fish tacos for once were cooked the way they are supposed to be cooked if youre not trying to rip your guests off. Perfect ratio of batter and fish, which means you tasted the beautiful juicy cod as the primary source of flavour while the batter complimented and served as a finish to its protein counterpart. Oh!....and it was so very fresh! The lager was yummy, they make their own stuff and I had a second one. I think youll have a great experience. Id be surprised if you dont. They cant be this good and be inconsistent.
Beer, chowder, poutine, and salmon burger. Absolutely fabulous! Good service and great location/atmosphere.  Would gladly go again.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Great photos Janice! We hope to see you again.

reviews.review_text: Large drink and food menus. We tried the fried pickles, seafood salad and pad Thai, everything was really tasty! Our server was really attentive and very personable. The prices are a little high but I think that s becoming normal. There is plenty of seating both inside and out and the patio looks out on Mainland Street in Yaletown which has lots of activity and is really beautiful. We went for dinner at 7 PM and at about 8 PM the music got pretty loud but it did add to the ambiance. I noticed that they also had a kids menu too! Which is actually pretty rare for this area.

We were happy to be able to sit outside and enjoy the weather and there was no wait. Loved my flight of beer and the pretzel appetizer. My son ordered the mac and cheese and it was very cheesy. the burger was well done as per BC rules and the pulled pork sandwich was moist and flavorful. Our server was very friendly and our meals were brought out promptly.

Great little place for a Saturday night beer and dinner. Welcoming atmosphere and decent service. They re part of dine out VANCOUVER but wasn t feeling the menus. The boneless dry ribs were awesome, and my main was the Tokyo with steak instead of salmon. Really tasty. Had the muffin dessert which was rich but flavourful. Will be visiting again.

Our favourite beer and burgers place in Vancouver. Especially when we can sit on the patio. The staff is friendly, the beer really good and there is a wide variety of food options. try the nachos! Usually we could get a seat within just a few minutes of wait, even during rush hour!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks Andre! We appreciate your kind words and Were glad to hear you enjoyed your time with us. We cant wait to serve you next time!

reviews.review_text: Visited during the happy hour and tried raspberry wheat ale which was amazing. Service was amazing and cost was reasonable.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Glad you stopped by and enjoyed a fresh beer!  Hope to see you again soon.

reviews.review_text: Nice environment and tasty foods with polite staffs.   Special thanks to  Justine  and  Danilo
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks for the shout out!  Justine and Danilo are fantastic!

reviews.review_text: Amazing experience and great, polite and attentive service. Everything was just perfect, we tried all the beers, all were $7.25. There is a great variety for everybody. We had cheeseburger, Mac n cheese and 4 cheese pizza, all great. Mac n cheese could be a bit improved. Happy hours are every day from 2PM to 5PM and all beers are for $5 during this time.

My favourite bar in Yaletown by the Roundhouse. Excellent home crafted beers such as the Roundhouse Wheat. Great food too. Amazing Salmon Chowder soup! The Singapore noodle bowl is very good. The Halibut burger is good. The pretzel is great with homemade white beer cheese. Their pizzas are amazing. Sunday night is $10 pizzas and $5 beers.

Great place to spend an evening with friends: excellent service, very friendly staff, tasty drinks and pizza for a reasonable price. We played pool, had fun and at the end of the evening I got a pleasant surprise - my ginger ale was on the house!

We are brewery people and love to try new places being from Minneapolis we are spoiled. I was impressed with the atmosphere at This brewery with a good selection of food and beers, it was worth the stop. It s a must stop for craft brewery folks like us.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks so much for checking us out!  Hope to see you again.

reviews.review_text: I am on my honeymoon in Vancouver. Justine our server was so happy and cheerful. She made us feel at home.  She introduced herself and made our experience so delightful. The food ?!  Oh my goodness.  Let s just say, I couldn t move because I ate the appy s so fast. It was that delicious. My newly wed wife and I had the nachos.   and the fish   tacos  . So Nicely done. We had these appy s from other places.  This place however, in my opinion was thee best. Guy the manager very kind. I requested something and he happily helped out and made my newly wed wife and my experience here a great one. Thank you so much we will come Back again. Until next time vancouver.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Michael thank you so much for the review.  We completely agree that Justine is a great server, Gui is a fantastic manager and we think our food is pretty delicious too.  Looking forward to seeing both of you again.   Congratulations on the nuptials!

reviews.review_text: Popped in for a few bevvies- hit the 8:30 pm happy hour  yay! The pub side is really hip and bumping but there isn t table service. Being the diva that I am went to the restaurant side and really lucked out with my server Lauren. Absolute sweetheart. Great vibe and teamwork, you can see the staff really enjoy each other and their jobs!!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Celisha, it was an absolute pleasure to serve you. We will pass along your kind message to Lauren and our team. Please visit us again soon!

reviews.review_text: From the decoration to the service everything is impeccable. If you go there (you really should), try their seasonal beers, theres at least one great surprise. I had the It was all about the dream I think, and it is and ale made of mango, passion fruit and coconut and it was delightful. I also had the poutine withe smoked chicken and this blew my mind: Ive never tasted a smoked chicken this rich and juicy before, a must. The place is so beautiful and well taken care it feels like home. Do not miss it!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Were very glad to see you enjoyed your time. We agree the smoked chicken is one of our favorites, and stay tuned we have plenty more seasonal beers on the way!

reviews.review_text: Great Beers, nice atmosphere and great location. Food is pretty good too. Reasonable Happy hour pricing.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you for joining us!

reviews.review_text: One of the all time favorite in Yaletown. Always reliable service and quality of food. Great happy hours menu. Lots patio seating to enjoy Vancouvers summer.

Very nice place, super spacious, with a large outdoor heated patio, super friendly quick service, great food. Open till about 1 am, last call at 10 pm. Pretty much always have seating available, just a normal regular bar that has enough room for big groups.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks Iya, cant wait to have you back for another safe and fun visit! Cheers.

reviews.review_text: The seats were uncomfortable, but the staff was so friendly. And I love this restaurants pizza!! I recommend you to come at happy hours.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank On Ki! Were glad to see you enjoyed your pizza, we cant wait to see you next time for Happy Hour.

reviews.review_text: The food and the service were great. The waitress was so nice. The bowls  sizes were super generous so we ended up having only one appetizer for the table.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks for stopping by Mina! Were so glad to hear that you enjoyed your experience. The 5 stars are much appreciated. Hope to see you again soon.

reviews.review_text: It has both a Restaurant and Pub side so has a little something for everyone. I had the loading Bay IPA and Beer pretzels which were both tasty.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks for joining us Braden.  We agree, the Beer Pretzel and Loading Bay IPA are a perfect pairing.  Hope to see you again!

reviews.review_text: Loved happy hour prices, the server we had was absolutely delightful, and the food was awesome, and the beet was delicious!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Were very happy to see you enjoyed your time with us, cant wait to see you again for another Happy Hour!

reviews.review_text: Nice thin crust pizza, with fresh toppings and amazing flavours.  Fresh beer on tap goes nicely with their pizzas.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks for the 5 stars Kevin, we miss you. Hope to see you again soon!

reviews.review_text: This is such a great spot to grab a beer and some delicious food. This brewpub has it all, from a fantastic selection of beers brewed in-house to a menu with delicious options. But what really sets Yaletown Brewing Co. apart is the incredible service provided by their staff. When we were planning a large group gathering, we reached out to the restaurant for help with reservations. Anushree and Natasha went above and beyond to ensure that our experience was smooth and stress-free. They were friendly, responsive, and accommodating, and we couldnt have been happier with their service. When we arrived, we were greeted warmly and shown to our tables promptly. The atmosphere was lively and inviting, and the menu offered something for everyone. We sampled a few of the brews on tap, and they were all so good. Overall, we had a wonderful experience at Yaletown Brewing Co., and were grateful to Anushree and Natasha for making it all possible. We highly recommend this establishment to anyone looking for a great meal and a great time in Vancouver!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank You very much Lisa, were very glad to hear everything went smooth, stress-free and everyone had fun. As always its a lovely pleasure to have you and your group join us. We agree the food, beer and staff here are all amazing. We look very forward to your next visit with us!

reviews.review_text: Amazing accommodating service when less busy. Grabbed food after a rainy Sun Run and they had blankets, dry complimentary t-shirts, and orange slices ready for us at our table! Very flexible with our changing numbers as people arrived. Lovely team service and felt very taken care of!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Were very glad to hear your group enjoyed your time with us post-sun run. Our service team looks forward to seeing you again, perhaps next marathon.

reviews.review_text: Great downtown location.  Surprised that they had paella expecting just bar food fare.  Not a lot of beer on tap selection but what they had was great.  Good place to start your pub crawl as they re all lined up next to each other in Yaletown.
Its an absolute star and one of the best in Vancouver. We tried garlic fries, it was so tasty. They have a beautiful environment and very friendly staff. I cant wait to go there again.
Excellent service, and top notch food. Good size portion! Everyone was really friendly, and the kitchen staff were on point! Highly recommend!

reviews.reviewer_name: Parkview Dental Vancouver and Implant Center
reviews.review_text: Pizzas are great, beers are awesome and great service always
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Those are some great photos! Were glad to see you enjoyed your time with us, and we cant wait to serve you again!

reviews.review_text: Amazing service. Try 604 Lager, you wont be disappointed. And definitely try parmesian garlic fries with it.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks for coming by!

reviews.review_text: Came in tonight for some drinks with friends and I received the BEST service I have ever had from Broghan and Jamie. Jamie made us the most delicious drinks we have ever had (his green tea shots are SUPERIOR)! Broghan had the best attitude and gave us such amazing and genuine service. Best place to come- if you re not here, it s your loss!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you Sara! Hope you visit us again!

reviews.review_text: Love the IPA s at this place. I have been here before and the food is very good. It has a neat vibe especially on a sunny afternoon. Service was excellent and follow up was nice, timely but not overbearing.
Yealtown Brewing is good spot to hang out with friends. The beer is good. The food was good. The waitresses are nice and friendly. Toilet is clean. A good experience.

** UPDATE ** After a speedy response from management we were promptly invited back and overall had an amazing experience with great food, drinks, and above and beyond service! Aisha and Tristen were professional and accommodating, and we couldn t be happier with the overall experience. Updated our rating accordingly. ** We ate at this establishment last night and will not be returning. If I could give zero stars I would. TL;DR: Extremely poor management, unclear billing, and poor treatment of staff! Ill start this off by saying our server was extremely sweet and none of this review is to reflect her in anyway. I called roughly an hour before to try and book a reservation, but was told they do not do same day reservations, but they accept walk ins. Ok no problem. So I asked if it was currently busy and if there would be a long wait to which I was told, I dont know, I cant tell you. Followed by the hostess hanging up on me. Fast forward an hour and there was less than 7 tables occupied in the entire restaurant when we arrived. We were seated outside next to one of their growler displays and while we were waiting for our food I noticed a live mouse running inside the glass display. Not the prettiest sight to see before eating your meal, however, the waitress moved us tables without any hesitation. Secondly, my girlfriend wished to substitute chicken instead of steak in her dish, which was confirmed as not a problem by the kitchen for a small upcharge. Little did we know that small upcharge was $9.44 for 4 THIN STRIPS of a chicken breast on top of the $24 original bowl price. See attached photo and try and find the entire chicken breast. Lastly, after our bill had come to $150, the manager had brought out our to go food order, and we asked a question regarding the cost for chicken, to which she rudely replied we do not do substitutions so we have to upcharge to make it work. Is chicken not cheaper than steak? If anything this establishment just saved money by giving chicken instead of steak as the protein in this meal. Furthermore, we ordered two orders of their honey siracha wings,  one came to $17.85 and the other $15.27, why you might ask? No one knows. Seeing that my girlfriend was rightfully annoyed by this, the manager said she would be right back. A few moments later our waitress came back to us with $10 cash and apologized for her mistake. What mistake you might ask? Your guess is as good as mine, but if you ask management it was probably the servers mistake not telling us there would be a $10 upcharge on the meal. To which my girlfriend asked her did they make you give us this money out of your own pocket? and the waitresses response was less than lack luster. Well... yes but it was my fault. We insisted that she keep the $10 because thats absurdly ridiculous of management to make the waitress pay out of her own pocket for that. If the billing and rude manager wasnt reason enough for us not to return, the way management treated our waitress and forced her to pay out of her own pocket was the deciding factor. We will not be returning.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you for taking our call to talk through your experience Brandon. Were delighted that youll be making a reservation with us soon. We truly appreciate guest feedback and an opportunity to improve: looking forward to earning 5 stars next time! Cheers! UPDATE: Hi Brandon, Thanks for the updated review. We appreciate you coming back in and giving us the opportunity to give you the proper 5 star experience. It was great to put a face to a name. Hope to see you again next time youre in town!

reviews.review_text: Cant wait to visit again. Sadly not catching Happy hours but still worth going. Totally worth it!

Great place for beers and good food, casual restaurant atmosphere. Make sure you go to the pub side if you want to enjoy happy hour though as its not available in the restaurant side. The appetizers change often and they are certainly worth it. Highly recommend this place, its never disappointed us in the dozen or so times we have been.
Great place to grab beer. Smooth lager, get their flight to try various beers. Raspberry wheat ale was quite good.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks for stopping by!  The Raspberry Wheat Ale is one of our favourites.  Glad you enjoyed it.  Hope to see you again soon.

reviews.review_text: If I were to open a brewpub I would copy this one. Comfortable wood-and-leather atmosphere, a pool table, and big enough but not too big. The bar side is especially cozy and inviting (but see below). Consistently great service and eight tasty home brews. One complaint: all the tables on the bar side are high-chair style. Uncomfortable for most people and impossible for wheelchairs.

Excellent quality of pizza.  halft beer selection rotate oftens, but therell probably be at least one you like. The pizza and beer deal on Sundays is worth making a trip for. Saturday nights for Canucks games are fun too.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Jas, Thanks for the great review, we truly appreciate it! All the best, Shane Dembiske General Manager Yaletown Brewing Co.

reviews.review_text: Good beer, great food! The soft pretzel was amazing, I tried at least 3 or 4 on vacation and this was by far the best one. I got one of the happy hour pizzas and it was absolutely massive for around $16. Will definitely be back when I m in town!
Awesome pub!  Came for happy hour pizza and beer. Both were excellent! Friendly staff and clean facilities.
Hands down, the best wings I have ever had. Tons of brews on tap, and huge spacious interior with all the tvs to watch your sport on. Go for the wings, stay for the beer.

Very convenient spot close to the middle of Yaletown, with outdoor seating and a huge indoor space (top and bottom levels). Anyway, the brewery is pretty cool, the beer selection enormous and the staff gorgeous. I had my first lunch here after restaurants are opened again for dine in. Normally I m not really into pub food but honestly I haven t have anything as good as the food here for awhile. Wait time was short, excellent food too. Plus the atmosphere is very cozy

Great food, lively atmosphere and delicious beers.... what more could you ask?? Oh yeah, waitstaff that know the menu and treat you like youre part of the family...gotta love it!  Highly recommend the Mumbai wings and the potato skins. Mac and cheese: delish!
The STEAK SALAD (I order it WITHOUT the BBQ sauce) is BY FAR the best salad I have ever eaten. Extremely fresh with the perfect mix of ingredients and the perfect dressing. I am addicted!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks so much for the kind review Trina! Cheers, Shane Dembiske General Manager Yaletown Brewing Co.

reviews.review_text: Attentive staff, generous portions, good beer (almost as good as Australian beer), and lovely food. Highly recommended.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you Peter! Were very happy to see you enjoyed your time with us, and yes Australian Beer holds a little place in our hearts too.

reviews.review_text: Excellent selection of Brew. Must have the Tempura Asparagus Apps. Over the top tender. GreAt vibe and if the weather is nice sit outside.
Had a beer and poutine at Happy Hour. Good snack to split, if your looking to stop in for a quick brew.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks Matthew! Glad to hear you enjoyed your time with us, we cant wait to serve you again.

reviews.review_text: Had a nice  dinner at the pub. Ordered Butter chicken and garlic fries which were simply amazing! Anny was super friendly and helpful. Had a really good time. Will definitely visit again when i am back in Vancouver.
Friendly staff! Speed of service was good, I liked the beer options.

Great service and food is always really good! Usually we pick patio but when colder then prefer the leather seating :) It does takes awhile for food to arrive, but it s totally worth it. On the downside, we used to see the magician a while back and he d keep us and kids entertained while waiting for food, but we haven t seen him lately
Had a couple seasonal beers at the pub side and they were really good. The service was good as well. Would come back.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: We are so glad you enjoyed our service! We look forward to serving you again.

reviews.review_text: Came here today with my boyfriend for supper and the food was delicious! I had the YBC Cheeseburger and he doesn t remember the exact name of his but said it was something like BBQ brisket sandwich. Anyway, both were delicious and the food also came out extremely quickly! We had a great experience!! We were also surprised that they were able to fit us in on such short notice (we were walkins) but they sat us right on the patio and we got immediate service. Amazing job!!
Great place,great atmosphere,good food. Thanks to our waitress Kayla, we got the best,friendliest, professional service. Made our experience so great. Looking forward to her smiling face again.
Exemplary service+++. The food choices were extensive for my taste and I was pleased to be able to have a half flight tasting.
Delicious food and good service! Lots outdoor seating.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you for coming down to enjoy the food and the sunshine with us Tiffany! Have a great day!

reviews.review_text: The food was delicious, I had the meatloaf and the kids loved the mac and cheese. Tasty beers as well. Noisy inside, but great on the patio.
I come here quite often to have a drink with some friends. I love their reisling and recently tried their ceaser! The ceaser was exactly how I like it! I was so impressed :)
Good spot for drinks, live DJ on Fridays. We sat on the patio with our party for drinks, it was warm with their patio heaters, good vibes!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Were very happy to hear you enjoyed your night with us. Well see you next time for more good vibes!

reviews.review_text: I came here on a reservation with a group of friends on a friday night. The server was fantastic and would come to our table s regularly. The food and drinks came out fantastic!

Hubby and I came by here.. We had excellent beers and the service was very good. Our gal had the coolest green / blue hair, and was honestly run off her feet with the whitecaps game , but she never missed a beat and kept smiling and being polite. Definitely will come back
Great food, great service! Love their smoked brisket sandwich!!!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you for your patronage, Elisabeth. Cheers,

reviews.review_text: Surprising smooth local rye from Yaletown brewing. Cool stuff, wish they would ship to Toronto!
Friendly staff, good food and drinks. Nice interior.
It was a beautiful day on their patio.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: We agree! Beautiful weather is finally here which means well see you on the next sunny day.

reviews.review_text: Best fried pickles I have had in my entire life and a delicious pitcher of beer.
Great beers, service and food.

Vaccine checked at the door. My wife and I sat on the patio. My wife had fish tacos and I had the cheeseburger. Great tasting meals. Very good service. Servers were all friendly and talkative.we would recommend this restaurant.  We will return ourselves.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you for your attention to detail John, we appreciate your 5 stars!

reviews.review_text: Great tasting beers and food was good too
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks for coming by and visiting us!  Hope to see you again soon.

reviews.review_text: We sat on the pub side and must say the service and the food was amazing, my wife and i had the wings and must say they are amazing. The beer is also good i had the ipa and my wife the lager.
Great Lamb burger and the fresh brewed beer was good.
Amazing service and nice atmosphere.  Great brews. I hear the food is pretty good but I did not taste it.

Vanessa was an amazing hostess, she accommodated us with such ease on a busy night. We came in last minute and did everything she could to help us get a table. So glad to come in on a night when she was working because she made the night so much better!! Daniel was also a great server and so professional and nice! Overall the night was made so much better from both of them! Can t wait to come back and see them both again. Thanks for making our night!!
Perfect for them vegan tasty Its fun to sit down and eat there Great music In short she strongly recommends
Food was excellent, service was very quick. Nice atmosphere.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Were glad to hear you enjoyed yourself! We cant wait to see you soon!

reviews.review_text: I feel like home, its a perfect place to go alone or with friends. I love my Porter beer, was delicious.

We came in for drinks after work one day.  The beer was great - easy drinkers.   We had to get a bigger table because more people were joining us, and the staff was very accommodating - they didn t even care that we  were holding empty seats for a while.   I found it bizarre that happy hour specials only applied to the pub side and not the restaurant.  I would definitely come back as it s a good place to go with a crowd.

Really enjoyed my experience at Yaletown Brewing! We got a nice spot on the patio. Service was prompt and our server was so delightful. (He apologized about it being slow but we did not find it slow!) I had the spritz beer cocktail which was a refreshing change. Ordered some sliders, pickles, and a pretzel to share. All were very delicious. My friend said that they were some of the best deep fried pickles shes ever had.
Very welcoming staff, nice atmosphere,  good food
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you Andre! We hope to see you again soon.

reviews.review_text: Great time here. Friendly service even though the restaurant was packed on a Saturday night. Came late for drinks and snacks, good selection of both. The wings were so good!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks for the amazing feedback Iris! We take a lot of pride in our  24 hour Southern buttermilk marinated, fresh cooked wings - so glad you enjoyed them! Cheers.

reviews.review_text: Very good food and service. Tasty brews.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks for the awesome review Miguel, we really appreciate it! Cheers, Shane Dembiske General Manager Yaletown Brewing Co.

reviews.review_text: 4 of us came for dinner on September 13, and 2 of our 4 entrees werent fully cooked (the rice was hard and stale). We told our server and within seconds the Manager that night, Eric, came and apologized and offered to make us new dishes right away. We put in new orders and had them served to us super quick. Eric and our server apologized again and made sure our meals were what we wanted. Cheers to the team for excellent customer service! Oh and the food was really good too!

UPDATE (5 stars): Well that was totally unexpected. I was given an email to make a claim, and I was promised I would get refunded in the coming days after I contacted them. I decided to change my review to 5 stars because there was nothing wrong with the beers and more importantly, not many restaurant do a follow up with their clients to make amend. It felt good to know someone somewhere is listening. ORIGINAL (1 Star): We had beer only and realized after I got home I was charged a Moscow Mule by server with initial B. Make sure you check your bill before you leave the restaurant. Lesson learned.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Kel, were sorry to hear about this mistake. Please contact tristen.gosselin@mjg.ca at your convenience so that we can make it right! Cheers.

reviews.review_text: Ive got a few food allergies and going out to eat can be such a chore sometimes! The staff here were so attentive to my dietary needs, and the food was delicious. Great service all around, thank you!

Its funny, I only gave this place 3 stars because it was last year after covid and their happy hour wasnt tops. Much better now!! Service was awesome, few more specials, and the happy hour fish tacos are drool- worthy. Well done!!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Rob, thank you for your review. We will definitely review our specials/happy hour program and I appreciate any and all feedback. Thank you, Shane Dembiske General Manager Yaletown Brewing Co.

reviews.review_text: Service was a little slow to start, but was made up for and all was very good.
THE BRUNCH WAS SO AMAZING, I NEVER HAD THESE EXPERIENCE BEFORE, THE KITCHEN STAFF ITS AMAZING

We went here for my friends birthday and had a great time.  The servers were helpful with suggestions for drinks and even brought out a little cake with a candle.  We were outside on the patio which was heated - the heaters were making weird noises which sounded kind of scary, maybe look into those.  Overall would recommend it, fun environment, laid back and good food as well

Visually appealing restaurant & bar with excellently diverse appetizers and drinks. Went here before a hockey game wearing the opponents sweater and it was a fantastic time. Highly recommend if you are in the area looking for a nice drink or good pub food.

We came in for a 25th birthday dinner. Nathan, our sever was beyond amazing. Drinks were flowing, food was perfectly on time AND delicious. Whole night was was wonderfully set up, and extremely accommodating. Thank you for making our experience top notch Nathan. Would recommend to anyone who enjoys great food, and excellent service.
Great food and service. Thank you Cody, great experience!!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you Benedicto! Cheers.

reviews.review_text: Came here before the Foo Fighters show for dinner and drinks and some pool. Great service, friendly staff and good food. Had the Backyard Burger, it was super tasty especially with the bacon and cheddar - definitely recommend.
The food is really good, it s definitely worth the price.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you Joachim! We hope to serve you again soon.

reviews.review_text: Great beer, good service, reasonable prices. Didnt try the food because of previous reviews.
Great food, great service!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you so much for taking the time to provide us with your feedback Sheyma: YOU are great too! :)

reviews.review_text: Great food and staff with exceptional music! DJ Peppermint spins on Saturdays, and you cant get my girlfriends and I off the dance floor!!! Its our favourite spot in Yaletown. Check it out!
